医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
机器人系统可以加速线虫生物学不同领域的研究根据最近的一项研究，能够对模型生物秀丽隐杆线虫进行成像和转移的机器人系统可以取代数小时繁琐的实验室工作。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Robotic-system-may-accelerate-studies-in-diverse-areas-of-C-elegans-biology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Robotic-system-may-accelerate-studies-in-diverse-areas-of-C-elegans-biology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=31d7f3d8-cd47-4a91-9ede-7d2a484c9f16 Wed, 05 Jul 2023 12:18:02 -0400 Robotic system may accelerate studies in diverse areas of C. elegans biology
研究确定 ROR1 在胰腺癌转移中的作用肿瘤起始细胞或癌症干细胞在癌症治疗中受到关注，因为它们可以穿过身体并通过转移在其他部位引起癌性肿瘤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Study-identizes-role-of-ROR1-in-pancreatic-cancer-metastasis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Study-identizes-role-of-ROR1-in-pancreatic-cancer-metastasis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b48612c0-be82-4664-918b-6f37242258c2 Wed, 05 Jul 2023 12:12:51 -0400 Study identifies role of ROR1 in pancreatic cancer metastasis
青少年和年轻的肾癌幸存者患心脏病的风险较高弗吉尼亚联邦大学梅西癌症中心的最新研究表明，许多青少年和年轻的肾癌幸存者患心脏病的风险显着升高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Adolescent-and-young-adult-kidney-cancer-survivors-at-elevated-risk-for-heart-problems.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Adolescent-and-young-adult-kidney-cancer-survivors-at-elevated-risk-for-heart-problems.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4a4bc4d6-2ea7-4aa3-ae84-1c1427d69abb Wed, 05 Jul 2023 11:27:49 -0400 Adolescent and young adult kidney cancer survivors at elevated risk for heart problems
Arima Genomics 成立临床顾问委员会，继续走向临床Arima Genomics, Inc. 是一家利用 3D 基因组学揭示可操作见解以改善人类健康并推动生命科学发现的公司，今天宣布成立临床顾问委员会，以帮助该公司将 3D 基因组学技术推进到临床肿瘤学和生物制药市场。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Arima-Genomics-continues-momentum-toward-clinic-with-formation-of-clinical-advisory-board.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Arima-Genomics-continues-momentum-toward-clinic-with-formation-of-clinical-advisory-board.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=07a085ee-7675-4437-9416-3bcfcbaa5a40 Wed, 05 Jul 2023 11:05:00 -0400 Arima Genomics continues momentum toward clinic with formation of clinical advisory board
Bionano 宣布推出用于 OGM 的 Stratys™ 系统和用于血液恶性肿瘤的 VIA™ 软件Bionano Genomics, Inc. 今天推出了用于高通量光学基因组作图 (OGM) 的 Stratys™ 系统和 VIA™ 软件，可在一个集成软件中对 OGM、微阵列和下一代测序 (NGS) 数据的基因组分析进行可视化、解释和报告平台。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Bionano-announces-the-Stratyse284a2-system-for-OGM-and-VIAe284a2-software-for-hematologic-malignancies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Bionano-announces-the-Stratyse284a2-system-for-OGM-and-VIAe284a2-software-for-hematologic-malignancies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=234f5a57-9680-4186-b0ca-8a0f141265b7 Wed, 05 Jul 2023 10:54:00 -0400 Bionano announces the Stratys™ system for OGM and VIA™ software for hematologic malignancies
PureCap 方法为更纯净、更安全的 mRNA 疫苗带来了希望日本的一个研究小组开发了一种生产高纯度高活性 mRNA 疫苗的方法，使用独特的帽轻松分离所需的加帽 mRNA。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/PureCap-method-offers-hope-for-purer-and-safer-mRNA-vaccines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/PureCap-method-offers-hope-for-purer-and-safer-mRNA-vaccines.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=21474295-a914-41c2-967d-b7821fe00e9c Wed, 05 Jul 2023 10:41:00 -0400 PureCap method offers hope for purer and safer mRNA vaccines
美国心脏协会推出远程医疗认证以提高护理质量COVID-19 大流行从根本上改变了医疗保健专业人员为患者服务的方式。在过去的三年里，随着临床医生和患者寻找安全、可靠的方式来接受所需的护理，很大一部分护理已转移到虚拟领域。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/American-Heart-Association-launches-telehealth-certification-to-improve-quality-of-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/American-Heart-Association-launches-telehealth-certification-to-improve-quality-of-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8f345932-05e9-4234-80ce-2d3badf63f71 Wed, 05 Jul 2023 10:25:52 -0400 American Heart Association launches telehealth certification to improve quality of care
研究发现 PET 扫描不能有效诊断前 NFL 球员的慢性创伤性脑病一项新的研究表明，使用放射性示踪剂 (18F)-Flortaucipir (FTP) 检测过度磷酸化 Tau (p-tau) 的正电子发射断层扫描 (PET) 可能不适合诊断美国前专业人士的慢性创伤性脑病 (CTE) 神经病理学变化。风格的足球运动员。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/PET-scan-not- effective-in-diagnosing-chronic-traumatic-encephalopathy-in-former-NFL-players-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/PET-scan-not- effective-in-diagnosing-chronic-traumatic-encephalopathy-in-former-NFL-players-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5373d119-6d80-4d7a-95d9-c65875b20476 Wed, 05 Jul 2023 10:22:41 -0400 PET scan not effective in diagnosing chronic traumatic encephalopathy in former NFL players, study finds
西奈山推出首个眼科人工智能中心西奈山伊坎医学院成立了眼科人工智能和人类健康中心，这是纽约第一个此类中心，也是美国第一个中心之一。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Mount-Sinai-launches-first-of-its-kind-center-for-otropic-AI.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Mount-Sinai-launches-first-of-its-kind-center-for-otropic-AI.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=39609980-d1c1-4442-96ec-7ce896599413 Wed, 05 Jul 2023 10:16:44 -0400 Mount Sinai launches first-of-its-kind center for ophthalmic AI
严肃的猴子生意：通过数码相机检查黑猩猩心脏世界上第一个通过数码相机测量黑猩猩心率的实验可能有助于抑制圈养类人猿的心血管疾病，并为了解它们的大脑如何从幼年开始发育提供有价值的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Serious-monkey-business-Chimpanzee-heart-check-via-digital-camera.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Serious-monkey-business-Chimpanzee-heart-check-via-digital-camera.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a664122d-cb36-4890-8fa1-7d8c087f71e0 Wed, 05 Jul 2023 09:49:00 -0400 Serious monkey business: Chimpanzee heart check via digital camera
